reviews.review_msg: I loved this professor a lot! I wish there were more like her in the history department. Be prepared to read to understand the lecture content fully because this will also help your participation.

Dr. Malik is very caring and truly tries to connect with her students and wants them to succeed. Her lectures were quite interesting and she was engaging throughout them all. She was understanding of people not doing readings and did her best to explain difficult concepts. Definitely would recommend taking a class with her!!

She is very helpful when you ask questions/go to office hours. Her lectures can draw on for a while but shes very perceptive of the class atmosphere and always gives breaks when the class focus is starting to dwindle. Her feedback on papers is a little confusing/unclear so office hours are very helpful. She also tends to post the readings for us.

Professor Malik's lectures were really good and her class discussion activities were very engaging. Her assignments were also fun to do! You should be good as long as you're on top of all of the readings.
